title: Spotify Tracks
description: This dataset contains detailed information about various Spotify tracks. Each record represents a track with attributes such as track ID, name, genre, artists involved, album name, popularity score, duration in milliseconds, and whether the track is explicit. It provides a comprehensive view of different tracks, which can be used for various machine learning tasks like music recommendation, genre classification, and popularity prediction.

title: Lung Cancer
description: This dataset contains information related to various factors and symptoms associated with lung cancer. Each record represents an individual's data, including demographic information, lifestyle habits, and health conditions. This dataset is valuable for studying the correlation between these factors and the presence of lung cancer, and can be used for machine learning tasks such as classification, prediction, and risk assessment.

title: Housing
description: This dataset contains information about housing prices in various neighborhoods. Each record represents a property and includes various features related to the property and its location. This dataset is useful for studying the factors influencing housing prices and can be applied to regression tasks, price prediction, and real estate market analysis.

title: Heart Diseases
description: This dataset contains comprehensive information about various factors related to heart diseases. Each record represents an individual's medical and lifestyle data, including demographic information, health metrics, and behaviors. This dataset is valuable for studying the correlation between these factors and the presence of heart disease, and can be used for machine learning tasks such as classification, risk prediction, and patient profiling.

title: NSE Stocks
description: This dataset contains historical stock market data from the National Stock Exchange (NSE) of India. Each record represents daily trading data for various stocks, including information on open and close prices, high and low prices, trading volume, and more. This dataset is useful for financial analysis, stock price prediction, and studying market trends.

title: Titanic Passengers
description: This dataset contains information about the passengers who were on board the RMS Titanic. Each record includes demographic and socio-economic data about the passengers, along with their survival status. This dataset is widely used for machine learning tasks such as classification, survival prediction, and exploratory data analysis.

title: World Cup 2022
description: This dataset contains information about the 2022 FIFA World Cup teams, including their group assignments and FIFA rankings. Each record represents a team, providing data on the group's name, the team's name, and its FIFA ranking. This dataset is useful for analyzing team performance, group dynamics, and making predictions for the tournament.

title: Brisbane Water Quality
description: This dataset contains information about water quality measurements in Brisbane. Each record includes data on various water quality parameters such as pH, turbidity, and contaminant levels, collected from different locations over time. This dataset is valuable for environmental analysis, monitoring water quality trends, and assessing the impact of environmental policies.

title: Coffee Sales
description: This dataset contains information about coffee sales transactions. Each record includes details such as the date and time of the transaction, payment type, transaction ID, amount of money spent, and the type of coffee purchased. This dataset is useful for analyzing sales patterns, customer preferences, and revenue trends in the coffee business.

title: BBC News Classification
description: This dataset contains news articles from the BBC, each labelled with one of five categories (business, entertainment, politics, sport, tech). It is divided into a training set and a test set, and is intended for building and evaluating document classification models. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

title: Disney Plus Titles
description: This dataset contains information about titles available on Disney Plus. Each record includes details such as show ID, type (movie or TV show), title, director, cast, country, date added to the platform, release year, rating, duration, genres, and a brief description. This dataset is useful for analyzing the content library of Disney Plus, exploring trends in genres and ratings, and studying the availability of content across different countries.

title: IMDB Top 1000 Movies
description: This dataset contains information about the top 1000 movies as rated on IMDB. Each record includes details such as the movie title, director, cast, country, release year, genre, duration, and IMDB rating. This dataset is useful for analyzing the characteristics of top-rated movies, exploring trends in genres, and studying the impact of different directors and actors on movie ratings.

title: Laptop Prices
description: This dataset contains information about various laptops and their prices. Each record includes details such as the brand, model, processor type, RAM size, storage capacity, screen size, operating system, and price. This dataset is useful for analyzing trends in laptop specifications and prices, comparing different brands and models, and studying the impact of various features on the pricing of laptops.
